body.name: Neutrogena Soothing Clear Calming Mousse Facial Cleanser with Soothing & Calming Turmeric, Gentle Face Wash for Acne-Prone Skin, Paraben-Free, Oil-Free, Not Tested on Animals, 5 fl. oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 5-fluid ounce bottle of Neutrogena Soothing Clear Turmeric Mousse Facial Cleanser to cleanse and calm stressed, acne-prone skin
Turmeric has been celebrated through the ages for being rich in antioxidants and for its calming properties This formula, including turmeric, gently calms your stressed skin
Enriched with skin-friendly turmeric and non-harsh ingredients, this acne cleanser effectively removes pore-clogging dirt, oil, and makeup without stripping for soft and healthy-looking skin
The cushioning Turmeric Mousse gentle cleanses while soothing stressed & acne prone skin The oil-free formula rinses completely clean, with no unwanted reside or stains left behind

This soothing turmeric face wash is great for acne, combination, or dehydrated skin It is non-staining, non-comedogenic, and free of parabens, mineral oil, silicones, and sulfates This product has also not been tested on animals
body.description: Instantly cleanse and calm your skin with Neutrogena Soothing Clear Turmeric Mousse Facial Cleanser. Great for acne prone, combination, or dehydrated skin care, this gentle face wash from a dermatologist-recommended brand contains turmeric, long known for its soothing and calming properties, to calm stressed skin. Gentle ingredients effectively remove pore-clogging dirt, oil, and makeup without stripping, leaving skin soft and healthy-looking. The oil-free, non-comedogenic, and non-staining mousse rinses completely, with no unwanted residue left behind. The gentle mousse facial wash is not animal tested, and is paraben-, mineral oil-, silicone-, and sulfate-free. To use, wet face and gently massage the cleanser into skin and rinse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neutrogena Soothing Clear Calming Face Wash
reviews.reviewText: I really like this foaming face wash. It has a nice scent and works great to clean and not dry out.Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for my sensitive skin and nice light fragrance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best face wash!
reviews.reviewText: I accidentally started using this face wash when my husband bought a few for me. It wasn’t the right kind but I didn’t want to waste it I used all of them. I love it so much that now I buy them in bulk. I have sensitive skin and it works great with my skin. I love the foaming action. My face feels clean after each wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love all of Neutrogena's products! This one I originally purchased at Ross and could not find it anywhere else. Happy to find it on Amazon but which it where cheaper. I will keep searching for better pricing but this does wonders for your skin. It is not overdrying and helps keep my skin "calm" when I do have minor breakouts. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for cleanser that is not drying but helps with minor breakouts. I use in conjunction with their facial moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good cleanser!
reviews.reviewText: Very good cleanser. I definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love Neutrogena products. I tried this turmeric foaming wash a few years ago and fell absolutely in love with it. The smell is subtle yet refreshing. The foam is light yet still feels like it gets that deep clean feel you want for your face. It’s almost impossible to find this product in stores so when I saw it on here I was super stoked. I will continue to purchase as long as it’s available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bottle showed up with no plastic cap and no tamper seal. It was leaking in the box. All of the writing on the bottle is in a language I do not recognize. I will be throwing it away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: I love how it smells and use it every day .
